ing: 2 (1 gram) packets granular sucrolose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "This is a very simple clone for that overpriced name-brand bottled coffee drink I somehow became addicted to. It's also a great way to use the leftover coffee that always ends up getting dumped down the drain the next day."
ins: Mix milk, coffee, and sweetener together in a glass until sweetener is dissolved.
